Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator McClure with an amendment. With written report No. 98-257.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 438.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to convey certain lands in Lane County, Oregon.

summary.text: (Reported to senate from the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources with amendment, S. Rept. 98-257) Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey, without consideration, all right, title, and interest of the United States in certain land in Lane County, Oregon, to persons with documented proof that they were deprived of property titles as a result of a specified survey by the Bureau of Land Management.

titles.title: A bill to convey certain lands in Lane County, Oregon.
